pageContext.claim: “I tell the story about Keystone. … That was dead for a couple of years, and no chance. I get elected, I approve it almost, like, in the first day, right at the very beginning. And I just say to myself, ‘Can you imagine the boss of whatever the hell company it is — who never actually called me to say thank you?’ But that’s okay.”
pageContext.analysis: TransCanada chief executive Russ Girling actually thanked Trump twice in a meeting.
